alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Polk County through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Intercession City to near Auburndale to near Combee Settlement. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Lake Alfred, Davenport, Polk City, Rockridge, Withla, Winter Haven Airport, Loughman and Inwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
